content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"End-User Services Internal KB space\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is the main library of knowledge enriched by different teams, including local teams, Remote support and EUS KM team. One of the main objectives of this space is to collect and provide information on actual processes, tools, programs, and so on, that almost every EUS Engineer deals with in their daily work, and thus preventing knowledge gaps that may arise.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The main audience of this KB space is represented by \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EUS Engineers\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The information in the Internal KB is divided into logical sections for easy reference. A short description of each of the sections is presented below:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/JqURTw\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Programs and Processes\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". The section gathers and provides description of processes performed by the End-User Service (EUS), as well as programs that are implemented by, or with participation of the EUS. Here you may find working instructions developed for Engineers, articles on how to solve problems that EUS Engineers may face in their daily work, description of EPAM programs, description of service processes, and so on.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/_aURTw\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Tools and Reporting\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". The section collects and provides information on the tools that the EUS Engineers use in their work, and description. Here you may also find tips and FAQs on the tools.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/bDSnTQ\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Career Development\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". The section compiles and provides information on the opportunities that EPAM provides to its employees to develop their skills and career. Here you may find skills matrices for each job level, information on skills to develop with a detailed information on each, the lists of training courses to take for skills improvement, the tools used, and so on.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/RaYRTw\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Specifics\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". The section provides information on specifics in various processes, for example, in the process of acquired company transition, country and\\\\or project specific information.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/zaURTw\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Reference info and registry of other KBs\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". The section is aimed at gathering information about other Business Systems and Services (BSS) spaces along with a brief description. It should help navigate and gain information, and improve intercommunication between teams.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Sections are subject to ongoing updates and revisions as new processes, tools, and so on are introduced.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
